Champaign.University of Illinois Institute of Avia: The University of Illinois Institute of Aviation was an aviation institute affiliated with the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Founded in 1946, it was located at the university-owned Willard Airport in Savoy, Illinois, United States. The institute was the first school in the U.S. to be certified by the Federal Aviation Administration to conduct all tests leading to the issuance of civilian pilot certificates.
